p: Extracts of all parts tested of C. fissilis were inactive for both clones (IC 50 > 20 µg/mL), whereas C. odorata wood and C. salvadorensis leaf extracts were two of the most active against clones D6 and W2 (IC 50 < 20 µg/mL). However, compared to the other extracts tested, C. odorata showed higher activity. IC 50 values for these Cedrela species are presented in Table 11 [ 69].
